alert.note: Alert for Eastern Black Range Foothills; Lowlands of the Bootheel; Southern Gila Foothills, Mimbres Valley; Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range; Southwest Desert, Lower Gila River Valley; Uplands of the Bootheel (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 29 at 6:14AM MDT until March 29 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...For areas within the Gila Region and Bootheel, including Hidalgo County, Grant County and western portions of Sierra County. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 9 PM MDT this evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will create hazardous driving conditions, especially for high profile vehicle. Loose outdoor objects will be blown around and blowing dust may also become an issue which can reduce visibilities.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Black Range Foothills; Lowlands of the Bootheel; Southern Gila Foothills, Mimbres Valley; Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range; Southwest Desert, Lower Gila River Valley; Uplands of the Bootheel
